speaker_turns.text: I'd like to schedule a follow-up appointment for my blood test results
When was your last visit with Dr. Miller?
Two weeks ago, on the 14th
She has an opening next Tuesday at 10 AM or Thursday at 2 PM
Tuesday at 10 would be perfect
Hi, I need to extend my rental car for three more days
I can help with that. What's your rental agreement number?
It's RX789234
The additional three days will be $147 total. Would you like to use the same card?
Yes, please use the same card
I'm interested in joining your gym. What membership options do you have?
We offer monthly plans starting at $39.99 or annual memberships at $399
Does the monthly plan include fitness classes?
Basic classes are included, but specialty classes have an extra fee
I'll take the monthly plan then
I need to modify my hotel reservation for next month
I'll help you with that. What's your confirmation number?
It's HB452891
I see your booking for March 15th. What changes would you like to make?
Can I extend it for one more night?
I'd like to book a grooming appointment for my golden retriever
We have openings this Saturday morning. Has your dog been here before?
No, this would be his first time
The full grooming package for large dogs is $85. Would you like 9 AM or 11 AM?
9 AM works better for me
I noticed an unauthorized transaction on my credit card
I'll help you with that. Can you verify the last four digits of your card?
Yes, it's 4582
Which transaction are you disputing?
The $129.99 charge from Digital Store yesterday
